name: Alien
description:
Alien is a visual novel exclusively for adults! This story is about a guy who has been dreaming of having sex with an alien woman for a very long time. At some point, this dream comes true and the guy finally fucked an alien woman!
In this wonderful game you have to plunge into the story of two guys who have been fond of space for a long time. But he is fond of not only space, but also space women. His cherished dream is to fuck an alien woman. And he manages to do it! What happened next you will see in this game ... Get real pleasure from a very simple gameplay and cool music.
Beautiful graphics!
Relaxing music!
Exciting sex scenes!
